description:
The potential floodable area and the corresponding water depth in the event of a 1,000-year storm surge on the coast, calculated based on the situation (i.e. coastal protection measures) in the year 2015. A 1,000-year storm surge is a storm surge that has one chance in 1,000 of occurring each year.
(Source: Agency for Maritime Services and Coast, Coastal division).
keywords: Flood map, TAW, flood risk, coastal plain, Human health and safety
name: Flood map +7m TAW (Belgian coastal plain, 2017)
